00002 /*! dgbmatrix+dssmatrix operator */
00003 inline _dgematrix operator+(const dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00015               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00016               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   dgematrix newmat(matB);
00022   
00023   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00024     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00025       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00026     }
00027   }
00028   
00029   return _(newmat);
00030 }

00033 /*! dgbmatrix-dssmatrix operator */
00034 inline _dgematrix operator-(const dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00035 {
00036 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00037   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00038             << std::endl;
00039 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00040   
00041 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00042   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00043     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00044               << std::endl
00045               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00046               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00047               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00048     exit(1);
00049   }
00050 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00051   
00052   dgematrix newmat(-matB);
00053   
00054   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00055     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00056       newmat(i,j)-=matA(i,j);
00057     }
00058   }
00059   
00060   return _(newmat);
00061 }

00063 //=============================================================================
00064 /*! dgbmatrix*dssmatrix operator */
00065 inline _dgematrix operator*(const dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00066 {
00067 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00068   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00069             << std::endl;
00070 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00071   
00072 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00073   if(matA.N!=matB.M){
00074     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(const dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00075               << std::endl
00076               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00077               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00078               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00079     exit(1);
00080   }
00081 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00082   
00083   dgematrix newmat( matA.M, matB.N );
00084   newmat.zero();
00085   
00086   for(long c=0; c<matB.VOL; c++){
00087     for(long i=max(0,matB.Indx[c]-(matA.KU+1));
00088         i<min(matA.M,matB.Indx[c]+matA.KL); i++){
00089       newmat(i,matB.Jndx[c]) += matA(i,matB.Indx[c])*matB.Array[c];
00090     }
00091   }
00092   
00093   return _(newmat);
00094 }
